body_html:
as suggested here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43336553/how-to-use-tf-train-monitoredtrainingsession-to-restore-only-certain-variables

I edited prepare_session function (just commented out: # if not is_loaded_from_checkpoint:)
and now it works. I assume it can have bad effect in other scenarios but right now it looks like a bug

body:
as suggested here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43336553/how-to-use-tf-train-monitoredtrainingsession-to-restore-only-certain-variables

I edited prepare_session function (just commented out: `# if not is_loaded_from_checkpoint:`)
and now it works. I assume it can have bad effect in other scenarios but right now it looks like a bug
